co2Values.comment: co2-calculation: Assumption: similar production and process as white wheat flour.  calculation-process-documentation: Flour from wheat including still ca. 75% of the corn and with a mineral content of 0,64 - 0.90 % (2), coarser than white flour (1). Is in between of white flour and ry flour. Does not contain solely endosperm, but also some bran and germ.
